Description.Text: Located in Mayfair, Arlington House Apartments is a perfect starting point from which to explore London. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are there for guest's enjoyment. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, desk to ensure a restful night. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. Arlington House Apartments is an excellent choice from which to explore London or to simply relax and rejuvenate.
